body:
...also added gnutls as explicit dependency of cmake

I had trouble building cmake on my machine as it tried to use my global libgnutls which was apparently too new. After adding gnutls as an explicit dependency to cmake, I ran into trouble building gnutls as it tried to use my global libidn2 which also was too new. This fixed it.
title: Added new package libidn2 as explicit dependency for gnutls...
